songs.title: Who Owns My Heart
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
R-O-C-K Mafia

[Verse 1]
Creation shows me what to do
I'm dancing on the floor with you
And when you touch my hand
I go crazy, yeah
The music tells me what to feel
I like you now, but is it real?
By the time we say goodnight
I'll know if this is right

[Pre-Chorus 1]
And I feel you (feel you) pumping through my veins
Am I into you, or is the music to blame?

[Chorus]
Who owns my heart?
Is it love, or is it art?
'Cause the way you got your body moving's
Got me confused, and I can't tell if it's the beat or sparks
Who owns my heart?
Is it love, or is it art?
You know I wanna believe that we're a masterpiece
But sometimes it's hard to tell in the dark
Who owns my heart?

[Verse 2]
The room is full but all I see is
The way your eyes just blaze through me
Like fire in the dark
We're like living art

[Pre-Chorus 2]
And it hits me like a tidal wave
Are you feeling me, or is the music to blame?

[Chorus]
Who owns my heart?
Is it love, or is it art?
'Cause the way you got your body moving's
Got me confused, and I can't tell if it's the beat or sparks
Who owns my heart?
Is it love, or is it art?
You know I wanna believe that we're a masterpiece
But sometimes it's hard to tell in the dark
Who owns my heart?

[Bridge]
So come on, baby
Keep provoking me
Keep on roping me
Like a rodeo
Baby, pull me close
C'mon here we go, here we go, here we go

[Pre-Chorus 2]
And it hits me like a tidal wave
Are you feeling me, or is the music to blame?

[Chorus]
Who owns my heart?
Is it love, or is it art?
'Cause the way you got your body moving's
Got me confused, and I can't tell if it's the beat or sparks
Who owns my heart?
Is it love, or is it art?
You know I wanna believe that we're a masterpiece
But sometimes it's hard to tell in the dark
Who owns my heart?
